attributes.action: ban free tube-style video pornography websites
attributes.additional_details:
Some of the material available on the internet these days is disgraceful.
Websites such as http://www.youporn.com boast 1000s of free videos for all to see, with no concern regarding the damage it does to society.
Some of these sites even have rude words in the address. http://www.wanktank.net being one of the culprits.
People don't seem to realise how easily underage users can see this free and open material, despite the "proof of age" systems in place.
